description.en: This website implements react, styled-components, and react-spring. Currently, information on the projects is stored in a local JSON file, but I plan on creating an application that will store the data on a MongoDB Atlas instance and allow for basic CRUD operations.

title: Blog Content Editor
description: Using the MERN stack, I created an app that allows the user to write an article with details and store it to a local database. Articles can be styled with a rich-text editor and all HTML tags are preserved when saving to the database. The code is being served on a CentOS system with Vultr using nginx as the server.

title: React Theme Saver
description: This app is made with React and localStorage. Users can pick color themes and watch as they update in real time. The app allows the user to choose from either a single tone scheme or a complimentary color scheme where an appropriate secondary color is calculated based on the initial selection. They can also save these themes to or delete them from localStorage.

title: Zombie Game
description: This was created with PyGame, a Python module. It uses the module to implement collision detection and object oriented programming. The purpose of this game was to practice concepts in Object Oriented Programming.

title: Python Tutorials
description: After finishing the Zombie Game project, I filmed a series of tutorials that explained the coding process in detail. They are available to watch on Youtube.
